title: [bug] Expected GLOO_USE_IBVERBS to be defined
body_html:
Device info:

Linux 4.4.0-92-generic #115-Ubuntu SMP x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
Python 3.6.4 :: Anaconda custom
CUDA 9 / cuDNN 7
2X Quadro GP100
gcc (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.5) 5.4.0 20160609

Command:

conda install numpy pyyaml mkl setuptools cmake cffi
conda install magma-cuda90 -c pytorch

module load cudnn/v7.0-cuda.9.0
module load cuda/9.0
module load NCCL/2.1.2-cuda.9.0

export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../"
export CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR="/public/apps/cudnn/v7.0/cuda/include"
export CUDNN_LIB_DIR="/public/apps/cudnn/v7.0/cuda/lib64/"
export LANG="en_US.UTF-8"
python setup.py install

Stack Trace
